parameters.name: GroupType
parameters.description:
The type of the instances that are managed by the scaling group. Valid values:

*   ECS: Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances
*   ECI: elastic container instances

Default value: ECS.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The number of the page to return. Pages start from page 1.

Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page. Maximum value: 50.

Default value: 10.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the scaling group.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description:
The ID of the resource group to which the scaling group that you want to query belongs.

>  If the specified resource group does not contain scaling groups, null is returned.

parameters.name: ScalingGroupId
parameters.description:
The IDs of the scaling groups that you want to query.

The query result does not contain the IDs of inactive scaling groups, and no errors are returned.

parameters.name: ScalingGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the scaling group.

parameters.name: ScalingGroupName.1
parameters.description: ScalingGroupName.1 is the name of the scaling group that you want to query. The query result does not contain the names of inactive scaling groups, and no errors are returned.
